subject: Football
Steroids
Tests and Testing
Drug Abuse and Traffic
lead_paragraph: As many as eight N.F.L. players, including Saints running back Deuce McAllister, have tested positive for performance-enhancing substances and face suspensions.
snippet: As many as eight N.F.L. players, including Saints running back Deuce McAllister, have tested positive for performance-enhancing substances and face suspensions.
